from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Comorbidities_vw'
target_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Comorbidity'
main_table_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_EmergencyVisitData_Main'
sensitive_codes_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/refECDS_SensitiveCodesSNOMED'

# Read source view
src_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_delta_path)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_delta_path)

# Define merge condition
merge_condition = """
    tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid AND
    tgt.ComorbidityIDOrder = src.ComorbidityIDOrder
"""

# Define update condition
update_condition = """
    (COALESCE(tgt.Comorbidity, 'X') <> COALESCE(src.ComorbioditySNOMED, 'X')) OR
    (COALESCE(tgt.ComorbidityDesc, 'X') <> COALESCE(src.ComorbidityDesc, 'X'))
"""

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    src_df.alias("src"),
    merge_condition
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set={
        "Comorbidity": "src.ComorbioditySNOMED",
        "ComorbidityDesc": "src.ComorbidityDesc"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values={
        "visitarchiveid": "src.visitarchiveid",
        "ComorbidityIDOrder": "src.ComorbidityIDOrder",
        "Comorbidity": "src.ComorbioditySNOMED",
        "ComorbidityDesc": "src.ComorbidityDesc"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedBySource()
 .delete()
 .execute())

# Perform the additional UPDATE operation
main_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, main_table_path)
comorbidity_df = target_table.toDF()
sensitive_codes_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(sensitive_codes_path)

# Join the tables
joined_df = (main_table.toDF().alias("m")
             .join(comorbidity_df.alias("c"), col("m.visitarchiveid") == col("c.visitarchiveid"))
             .join(sensitive_codes_df.alias("sc"), col("c.Comorbidity") == col("sc.snomed"))
             .where(col("m.Sensitive_Flag") == "N")
             .select("m.visitarchiveid"))

# Update the main table
main_table.update(
    condition="visitarchiveid IN (SELECT visitarchiveid FROM joined_df)",
    set={"Sensitive_Flag": lit("Y")}
)

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")

updated_rows = main_table.toDF().where(col("Sensitive_Flag") == "Y").count()
print(f"Number of rows updated in the main table: {updated_rows}")

# Version 2

Older version of Delta Lake

from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Comorbidities_vw'
target_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Comorbidity'
main_table_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_EmergencyVisitData_Main'
sensitive_codes_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/refECDS_SensitiveCodesSNOMED'

# Read source view
src_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_delta_path)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_delta_path)

# Define merge condition
merge_condition = """
    tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid AND
    tgt.ComorbidityIDOrder = src.ComorbidityIDOrder
"""

# Define update condition
update_condition = """
    (COALESCE(tgt.Comorbidity, 'X') <> COALESCE(src.ComorbioditySNOMED, 'X')) OR
    (COALESCE(tgt.ComorbidityDesc, 'X') <> COALESCE(src.ComorbidityDesc, 'X'))
"""

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    src_df.alias("src"),
    merge_condition
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set={
        "Comorbidity": "src.ComorbioditySNOMED",
        "ComorbidityDesc": "src.ComorbidityDesc"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values={
        "visitarchiveid": "src.visitarchiveid",
        "ComorbidityIDOrder": "src.ComorbidityIDOrder",
        "Comorbidity": "src.ComorbioditySNOMED",
        "ComorbidityDesc": "src.ComorbidityDesc"
    }
 )
 .execute())

# Perform the delete operation for records not in source
target_df = target_table.toDF()
records_to_delete = target_df.join(src_df, ['visitarchiveid', 'ComorbidityIDOrder'], 'left_anti')

if records_to_delete.count() > 0:
    target_table.delete(
        condition = """
        visitarchiveid IN (SELECT visitarchiveid FROM records_to_delete) AND
        ComorbidityIDOrder IN (SELECT ComorbidityIDOrder FROM records_to_delete)
        """
    )

# Perform the additional UPDATE operation
main_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, main_table_path)
comorbidity_df = target_table.toDF()
sensitive_codes_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(sensitive_codes_path)

# Join the tables
joined_df = (main_table.toDF().alias("m")
             .join(comorbidity_df.alias("c"), col("m.visitarchiveid") == col("c.visitarchiveid"))
             .join(sensitive_codes_df.alias("sc"), col("c.Comorbidity") == col("sc.snomed"))
             .where(col("m.Sensitive_Flag") == "N")
             .select("m.visitarchiveid"))

# Update the main table
main_table.update(
    condition="visitarchiveid IN (SELECT visitarchiveid FROM joined_df)",
    set={"Sensitive_Flag": lit("Y")}
)

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge and delete: {affected_rows}")

updated_rows = main_table.toDF().where(col("Sensitive_Flag") == "Y").count()
print(f"Number of rows updated in the main table: {updated_rows}")
